Class Item

java.lang.Object
  Item

public class Item
extends java.lang.Object

This class exists in order to allow the Room class to create an item in the game 'Lost Pyramid'. It constucts an Item object with a description and weight. The weight will be used in subsequent versions of the game to limit how much a player can hold

Version:
(1.0 - 7th July 2015)
Author:
(Candidate Number: 138123)

Constructor Summary
Item(java.lang.String description, double weight)
          Creates a new item with the given description and weight.
 
Method Summary
 java.lang.String getDescription()
          The description is effectively the name of the item
 double getWeight()
          Weight will be used to determine how many items a player can carry
